Alex Chace, M.A.

Bio

I am an interdisciplinary scholar with interests in biomedicine, cybernetics, gender studies, horror films, psychoanalysis, and posthumanism.

Education

PhD, Moving Image Studies (Georgia State University).

Aug 19-May 2023.

MA, Anthropology (GSU).

Aug 17-May 2019.

Committee: Cassandra White (chair), Jennifer Patico, and Megan Sinnott.

BA, Applied Linguistics (GSU).

Aug 13-May 2017.

Work Experience

Graduate Research Assistant (Global Health Discourses Project).

Jan-May 2019

Employed R and igraph to visualize a social network of global health organizations based on website data.

Graduate Teaching Assistant (GSU Dept. of Anthropology).

Aug 17-Dec 2018

Taught break-out sessions and guest-lectured in several introductory Anthropology courses. I also graded papers, tests, and other assignments.

Growth Marketing Intern (SimpleShowing, Inc).

July-Nov 2017

Developed automated leads generation infrastructure in Python, using data from Zillow and other sources with customized text- and email-based outreach and preferential lead selection. I also assisted in updating company websites and customer-facing infrastructure in React, HTML, and CSS.
